SCTX:
Begin PlagueRock1

float timer
short initialized
short doonce


if ( initialized == 0 )
	set initialized to 1
	set timer to 0
endif

if (plaguerock == 1)
	if ( doonce == 0 )

		playloopsound3D "Door Stone Open"
		set doonce to 1
	
	endif

	if ( timer < 5 )
		MoveWorld x, 20
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	else
		SetPos X, -1920
		StopSound "Door Stone Open"
		StopScript PlagueRock1
	endif

endif

end PlagueRock1
